name: Prodigy Trainer
description:
A young warrior from the greatest academy in the galaxy ventures on her biggest adventure yet to learn the powers of the dark forces. Powers that corrupt all who go near and devour those who are too weak to hold the embrace. She takes the initiative to search for you, the greatest warrior in existence with the goal to gain your guidance and expertise.
Prodigy Trainer is a space based adult Visual Novel (VN).
In this game, you play as a legendary male warrior travelling the galaxy; you encounter a young woman who hunts you down in order to have you be her mentor.
As you train her… will she keep her strong values and remain headstrong or fall to the darkness like you.
The game is a trainer with free roam elements. This means that the goal of the game is to train Asmodea. There are multiple missions, planets and scenes to encounter with other characters.
